name: Loaded Dice (ambiguous-name, Cbeattie, Tonik)
description:
How To Play

In Loaded Dice, your main currency is dice, and they determine your effectiveness in talking to characters around the island as well as your strength in combat.

When walking around the island, the player may encounter chests or characters that they may interact with. If the player talks to a character, they may be prompted to start a social event. The player may choose as many of their dice as they want to roll, but they are expended upon use. The sum of the roll determines which dialogue option you choose. The higher the roll, the more favorable the option!

Controls  

Escape - Pause Game

WASD - Move

Left Mouse Button - (In Overworld) Interact, (In Combat) Fire Weapon, (In Social Event) Advance Dialogue

The mouse is also used to drag and drop dice onto the screen when prompted during Social Events and the start of Combat
